page.title: 06THE PROPOSED BY_PASS
page.content: The Proposed By_pass. Three routes have been proposed for the bypass. In all three cases they are about five km long and will cost approxmately five million pounds. The main problem with the by pass is the route that it will take. While all agree that it is needed no body wants it to go past their house. Another problem with the route is will it remove the Chard traffic as well as the A35 traffic ? To do this only one route is possible and that is from the Yarty bridge to Millbrook and then across Sector lane to Raymonds hill. As yet no firm route has been choosen and what ever the final route it will not please everybody.
